welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alexandria, where Southern charm meets historical significance. Explore our charming streets, filled with unique shops, delicious eateries, and rich history. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!

restaurants.name: The Lunchbox
restaurants.description: The Lunchbox is a fast food restaurant located in Alexandria.

restaurants.name: Oakly Farm Stall
restaurants.description: Oakly Farm Stall is a café located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue, Southwest, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for international flights, with several airlines utilizing this terminal.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for the first 45 minutes. After that, there is a charge for continued use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Tipton AAF Airport.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
